mdRecord.dcterms:description: One graffiti addresses the reader and says they will be redeemed; another graffiti comments on the handwriting of this first graffiti. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
you will be redeemed | YOUR HANDWRITING IS AMAZING
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Redemption
Penmanship
Greek letter societies
